participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Creative and laid-back, enjoys art and music.
participant_1.background: I'm going to have a nice lazy weekend with Toto. I'm going to miss the sun and the beach, but I'm ready to focus on my studies. My mom teaches kindergarten and my dad is a tax assessor. I play guitar in the local band. I am an artist.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and passionate about art and gaming.
participant_2.background: I don't have any pets, because I'm too busy with my cosplay gear and working out to take care of them. I love fishing. I am blind and my family are my eyes. I am single and enjoy the freedom of being able to focus on my art. My memories of my grandmother, who used to make the best mac and cheese in the world.

content.text: It's going great! I'm getting ready for a cosplay convention.
Oh, cool! What are you going to be?
I'm going to be a character from my favorite video game.
That sounds fun! I love video games.
Me too! I spend a lot of time playing them.
I know what you mean. I used to play a lot of video games when I was younger.
I still play them. I love the sense of adventure and the challenge.
Yeah, me too. I love being able to explore new worlds and solve puzzles.
Me too! I'm glad we have something in common.
Me too! What kind of video games do you like to play?
I like to play RPGs and adventure games.
I like those too! I also like to play strategy games.
Me too! I like the challenge of trying to outwit my opponent.
Me too! I think we'd make a good team.
I think so too! We should play a game together sometime.
That would be fun! I'm free this weekend.
Me too! I'll message you my gamertag.
